name: Roberto Rivera Sr.
notes: Renowned for Zapotec geometric rug patterns; taught weaving to son José Sr.

name: Consuelo Mendoza de Rivera
notes: Moved to USA with son José in 1974; anchor of the family in California until her death

name: José Rivera Sr.
notes: Immigrated to California with parents 1974; became farmworker then foreman then business owner

name: Maria Salinas de Rivera
notes: Second generation Mexican-American; family originally from Michoacán; learned English watching Sesame Street

name: Rosa Rivera
notes: Oldest of three children; remembers standing on a stool to help make tamales as a child

name: Daniel Rivera
notes: Has spent five years recording oral history interviews with parents and grandparents

name: Elena Rivera
notes: Youngest of three; visited Oaxaca with family in 1998 at age 11; spoke no Spanish but learned quickly

name: Ernesto Rivera
occupation: First to immigrate to California (1971); sent photographs home of palm trees and his house with a garage; sponsored José Sr.'s family
